name: Application Form for the Selection of Nine Experts for Project Implementing Team (PIT) in The Bihar State Cooperative Bank Ltd.

details.organization: The Bihar State Cooperative Bank Ltd.
details.positions: Nine Experts for Project Implementing Team (PIT)

name: Recruitment of Project Implementing Team in The Bihar State Cooperative Bank Ltd.

details.Eligibility criteria:
Age: Between 25 to 40 years as on 01/06/2024.
Selection will be done on contract basis for a period of one year to be continued up to 5 years, which will be based on yearly performance and subject to renewal of contract on yearly basis with break in each extension.
details.Remuneration: Remuneration will be paid on monthly basis that will include all applicable taxes. There is no provision for providing any other benefits/ compensations to contractual person from the bank. However, Renumeration may be negotiated for exceptional candidates.
details.Terms & Conditions: In case of performance of the contractual person is found unsatisfactory, or he/she fails to perform/carry out the duties entrusted to him/her or he/she commits indiscipline behaviour, BSCB/DCCBs reserves the right to terminate the contract at any time without assigning any reasons thereof.
